title: #261: The Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
description:
Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested Thursday and charged with playing a key role in Jeffrey Epstein's alleged sex-trafficking operation. Laura, Jim and Lisa recorded a special Facebook Live to discuss the arrest.
